item.description:
Yup, time for our favorite place again!

Sea Dog Brewing

Â 

Have you been wanting to come out with the group but haven't had the chance to yet? This meetup is for you! We'd love to see some new faces along with our old favorites! Sea Dog is one of our favorite restaurants so please come join us for a great evening out!


Please keep in mind that "No Shows" are not acceptable. If you RSVP yes, please attend! We'd love to see you! If your plans have changed, please update your RSVP to no and give your spot up to another member who'd like to attend.

Restaurant Meetup Policy

Please remember, RSVP yes only if you plan to attend to allow us to make reservations. If you RSVP yes and change your mind on attending, you MUST provide at least 24 hours notice or you will be considered a "No Show". After 2 "no shows" to restaurant meetups, you will no longer be allowed to attend restaurant meetups.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the waiting area or ask for Rebecca's table.
item.name: Dinner at Sea Dog
